channel.title: Terminals on Mon cahier

item.title: Terminals and the art of terminal-ing
item.description: Terminals. It feels like everyone has heard the word. It also feels like everyone thinks they know what a terminal is, but do they? A terminalâ€™s actual definition has derailed significantly. Here is a terminal: What? This is not a terminal? You imagined a cool looking dual monitor computer with a black window and a person typing away their life? Nope. This is a terminal. This is actually one of the later iterations of a terminal.
